def Load(widget): registro = widget.Entity
if(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1): widget.View.Commands["CMD_ValidarRegistro"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_CancelarAbastecimento"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_GerarOs"].Visible = True
elif(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2): widget.View.Commands["CMD_ValidarRegistro"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CancelarAbastecimento"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_GerarOs"].Visible = False
elif(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 3): widget.View.Commands["CMD_ValidarRegistro"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_CancelarAbastecimento"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_GerarOs"].Visible = True
else: widget.View.Commands["CMD_ValidarRegistro"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_CancelarAbastecimento"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_GerarOs"].Visible = True
